snippet.title: Unearthing Mars 2 - Announcement Trailer | PS VR
snippet.description:
Unearthing Mars 2: The Ancient War continues the adventures of Unearthing Mars. However, this time you can use your PS VR Aim Controller to take down enemy foes as you travel back in time to an ancient Mars civilization. The new gameplay enables you to shoot enemies as you maneuver in and out of combat without feeling nauseous. 

Copyright © 2018 WINKING ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION. All Rights Reserved.
